japanese:
よーし！
午後もよく晴れて絶好の撮影タイムだ！
translation:
Alright!
The afternoon is so sunny.
What a wonderful time for a photoshoot!

japanese:
それじゃ、まずは一花の水着の写真ね。
撮ってなかったもの。
translation:
Okay then, first is Ichika's picture in a swimsuit.
We never got a picture of that.

japanese:
あのー？　私以外は誰も水着じゃないの？
１人で水着は、なんだか浮かれた人みたいで
寂しいかな、なんて。
translation:
Um? There's no one other than me in a swimsuit,
you know? Me being the only person in a swimsuit
enjoying myself feels kind of lonely.

japanese:
大丈夫！
私と三玖がいるよ！
translation:
It's alright!
Miku and I are here!

japanese: 二乃と五月がカメラマンだから。
translation: Because Nino and Itsuki are the photographers.

japanese: 責任重大ですね……！
translation: It's a big responsibility!

japanese:
気負わずに撮っていいぞ？
そのほうが自然といい写真が撮れるはずだ。
translation:
Just take some pictures
without worrying too much, okay? You'll be able
to take more natural pictures that way.

japanese: 隠し撮りしていた人の発言とは思えませんね。
translation:
I don't think those are good words
from someone who sneakily took photos of us.

japanese: いつまでそれを引っ張る気だ、お前。
translation: How long are you going to talk about that?

japanese: 撮影って、何から始めたらいいの？
translation: What should we start a photoshoot with?

japanese: やっぱり泳ぐのがいいのかなぁ？
translation: I suppose swimming, first?

japanese: 泳ぐなら、まずは準備運動しないとね。
translation: If I'm gonna swim, I've got to warm up.

japanese: いっち、にっ、さん、しっ！
translation: One, two, three, four!

japanese: ……むむ。
translation: ...Mmmhh.

japanese: どしたの？
translation: What's wrong?

japanese: 一花、スタイルがいい。
translation: Ichika has such good style.

japanese:
でも、私たちって大体同じ体型だよね？
三玖も一花もほとんど変わんないよ？
translation:
But we pretty much have the same body type, don't we?
You and Ichika are pretty much the same, Miku?

japanese: そうだよ、五つ子だし。
translation: That's true. We're quintuplets.

japanese: でも、なんか違う……。
translation: But, something's different about Ichika...

japanese:
たぶんだけど、動きじゃない？
一花はポーズも決まってるし、綺麗に見えるのよ。
translation:
I'm just guessing here, but is it her movements?
Ichika's poses are really good,
which make her look pretty.

japanese:
同じ体型だとしても、ちょっとした仕草で
差がつくものなのですね。
translation:
Even if we have the same body type,
little gestures can make a difference.

japanese:
そうだね、確かに見せ方を意識するかしないかの
違いかも。
translation:
Well, what certainly makes the difference is whether
you're aware of how you're showing yourself.

japanese:
何気ないポーズでも、どういう意図かを
きちんと表現すればそれなりに見えるんだ。
たとえば、こんな感じで……。
translation: For example, like this...

japanese:
どう？
こないだ撮影したＣＭ、こんな感じだったんだ。
translation:
How is it?
This is what I did for a commercial shot the other day.

japanese:
おおー！　一気に雰囲気が変わった！
プロだねー。
translation:
Oooh! Your atmosphere completely changed!
You really are a pro.

japanese: よし、いい感じに撮れたわよ。
translation: Great, I got some good photos of you.

japanese:
むむう……。
同じポーズを取っても全然違う。
translation:
Mmmhh...
Even if I do the same pose,
it's completely different.

japanese: そりゃっ！　はっ！！　やあっ！
translation: HIYAAH! HAH!! YAH!

japanese:
四葉、ポーズ取るのにかけ声は必要ないでしょ。
変身でもする気？
translation:
Yotsuba, you don't need a shout to pose, do you?
Did you plan on shapeshifting?

japanese:
でも、四葉さんも一花さんと同じくらい
綺麗なポースが取れてるよ。
やっぱり五つ子なんだねー。
translation:
However, Yotsuba-san has just as beautiful a pose
as Ichika-san.
You guys are quintuplets after all, huh...

japanese: むむむ……。
translation: Mmmmhh...

japanese: くうっ……こ、こんな感じ……？
translation: Urrgh...l-like this?

japanese:
まだ動きに照れが残ってるかな。
やるからには、四葉くらい思い切らなきゃ。
translation:
You're still embarrassed by the movements.
You're going to have to be as bold as Yotsuba
if you want to do it.

japanese: 思い切る……。
translation: Be bold...

japanese:
一花、お願い。
もう一度、最初からやってみせて？
translation:
Ichika, please.
Would you do it again, from the begining?

japanese: あー、うん、いいけど……。
translation: Ah, um, I suppose...

japanese: こんな感じね。
translation: Like this.

japanese:
おおおー！
さすが一花、キラキラしてるよ！
translation:
Oooohh!
As expected, Ichika, you're all sparkly!

japanese: うん、やっぱり四葉さんとはちょっと違うかも。
translation: Well, she might be a little different than Yotsuba-san.

japanese:
あはは……。
ありがとね。
translation:
Ahaha...
Thank you.

japanese: なんだ、照れてるのか？
translation: What, are you embarrassed?

japanese: て、照れるっていうか……。
translation: N-not embarrassed, but...

japanese:
仕事関係なしに、みんなの前で
何回もやるのって恥ずかしいや。
初めての感覚だよ。
translation:
It makes me a bit self-conscious to do it so many times
in front of everyone without it being work.
It's the first time I've felt that.

japanese: 撮れました！
translation: I got a lot of good pictures!

japanese: わわ！？　今のまで撮っちゃうの？
translation: UWAAAA?! You were taking pictures even now?

japanese: ええ、一花の新しい表情を残しちゃいましょう。
translation: Yes, I wanted to preserve your new expression, Ichika.

japanese:
そうだね。
今この瞬間の私、だもんね。
translation:
That's right.
The me, in the moment, huh.

japanese:
ねー！　私もそろそろ撮って！
横でポーズ決めてるだけなのはさびしいよ～。
translation:
Hey! Take a picture of me here, soon!
It's lonely just posing to the side.

japanese:
うん。
もっと、一花みたいな綺麗なポーズで
撮られたくなってきた。
translation:
Yes.
I'd like to have my picture taken more
while doing pretty poses, like Ichika.

japanese:
ふふ、そんな風に言ってもらえるなんて。
すっごく嬉しいや。
translation:
Teehee, to be told that in that way.
I'm really, really happy.

japanese:
いいわよ～！
さあ、もっといきましょっか！
translation:
Great!
Let's keep on going, then!

japanese:
二乃までノリノリだな。
一花が本気を出したらこうなるのか。
translation:
Even Nino's getting into it.
When Ichika shows her true colors,
this is what happens, huh.

japanese:
やはり、一花には人を惹きつける魅力がありますね。
惹きつけ、さらに先へと引っ張っていって
くれるような、何かが。
translation:
After all, Ichika has a charm that attracts people.
Something that attracts them,
and pushes them even further ahead.

japanese: うまく言葉にできないのですが……。
translation: I can't really put it into words well...

japanese:
あいつの、自分の道を迷いなく進んでいく
背中を見てるから、じゃないか？
translation:
Isn't it because we're watching her from behind
proceed down with her path with no hesitation?

japanese: ええ、かもしれません。
translation: Yeah, that might be true.

japanese:
あ、スマホのバッテリーがかなり減っちゃった。
充電しないとまずいわね。
translation:
Ah, my smartphone battery is pretty low.
I've got charge it, or else.

japanese:
あ、その前に写真見せて？
どんな風に写ってるか見たい。
translation:
Ah, show us the pictures before it dies, would you?
I wanna see how they turned out.

japanese: 待って！
translation: Wait!

japanese: なに？
translation: What?

japanese:
ここで確認しちゃうのって味気なくない？
失敗してるからって消しちゃうのも。
translation:
Isn't it kind of tasteless to check here?
Also, we should erase some because they're failures.

japanese:
でね、思いついたんだけど、
アルバムには撮った写真を全部使う、なんてどう？
translation:
So, I came up with an idea.
How about using ALL the photos we took
for the album?

japanese: 失敗してるのも変な顔してるのも、全部！
translation:
All of the failures and ones with funny faces,
all of them!

japanese:
なるほどな。
嘘偽りない、ありのままの姿か。
translation:
I get it.
Everyone as they really are,
with no lies, or falsehoods.

japanese:
そういうこと。
嬉しいことも、悲しいことも、恥ずかしいことも、
ぜーんぶ収めておくの。
translation:
That's right.
We include all the happy, sad,
and embarrassing things.

japanese: ……そうね、それがいいわね。
translation: ...You're right, that's nice.

japanese:
うん。
消したくなるくらい恥ずかしいのも
あるかもしれないけど――
translation:
Yeah.
There might be some we find so embarrassing
that we want to delete them%p-2;――

japanese: その気持ちだって、想い出だから。
translation: But those feelings, they are memories.

japanese: ＮＧ集もまとめてお得なアルバムだね！
translation: The failures could be put together into their own album!

japanese:
ええ、これが今の私たちだと言える
唯一の物として。
translation: Yes, as the only things that show us who we are now.

japanese: うん、中野家の大切な宝物になると思うんだ。
translation:
Yep, I think it will be an important treasure
to the Nakano family.
